Instance.description: A Basic Aspiration that can be displayed to the UI. This is used for both Aspirations that display in the UI within the Aspiration panel and for Aspirations that exist in the background.

TunableEnum.name: aspiration_valid_age_type
TunableEnum.description: Valid age type for this aspiration. For example, if CHILD_ONLY is selected, this aspiration can only be completed by a child and sim will not be considered complete even if all of the objectives are completed as a non-child. Note: Teen can complete both teen and YAE aspiration but YAE can not complete teen aspiration. TODDLER_ONLY aspiration will not shown in UI as toddlers can not select their aspirations.

Tunable.name: is_child_aspiration
Tunable.description: This tuning is DEPRECATED, use aspiration_valid_age_type instead. If checked then this aspiration can only be completed by a child Sim and will not be considered complete even if all of the Objectives are complete as a non-child.

Tunable.name: is_teen_aspiration
Tunable.description: This tuning is DEPRECATED, use aspiration_valid_age_type instead. If checked then this aspiration can only be completed by a teen Sim and will not be considered complete even if all of the Objectives are complete as a non-teen.

TunableList.name: on_complete_loot_actions
TunableList.description: List of loots operations that will be awarded when this aspiration completes.

Tunable.name: reward
Tunable.description: The reward given when this Aspiration is completed.
